alert.note: Alert for Breathitt (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 11 at 2:54PM EDT until September 11 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Breathitt County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 254 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Houston, or 9 miles east of Booneville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Canoe around 300 PM EDT. Curt around 310 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Dumont, Jackson, Haginsville and Stevenson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
